entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Cape Race
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cape Race 2:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: WSW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then northeast 70 gusting to 100 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to rain or freezing rain near noon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 70 km/h gusting to 100 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
